text:
SmugMug | Data Architect | Mountain View, CA | Remote | https://www.smugmug.com/ SmugMug is currently seeking a seasoned Data Architect who would be passionate about jumping at the opportunity to lead the technical vision for data throughout SmugMug and Flickr.

Click here for more info: https://jobs.smugmug.com/Job-Openings?1524027?gh_jid=1524027
